title: Gates Of The Arctic National Park & Preserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News          The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news, special events, projects, and accomplishments which occur within & around each of its units. Gates of the Arctic National Park & Preserve provides press releases to local newspapers as well as posting them here. For all press inquiries, call the Public Information Officer at (907) 455-0641. View all current news releases for Gates of the Arctic        Additional links to Gates of the Arctic news and current events:   Current Resource Division Updates   Ambler Mining District Access Right-of-Way      Celebrating & Preserving Wilderness: Using Sled Dogs to Remove Trash
